fallacy claim: All reality dating shows are the same as The Bachelorette.
evidence: The Bachelorette is an American reality television dating game show that debuted on ABC on January 8 , 2003 .
The show is a spin-off of The Bachelor aired on the same network .

fallacy claim: Zeus is Cronus's child because Zeus is the child of Cronus and Rhea.
evidence: Zeus is the child of Cronus and Rhea , the youngest of his siblings to be born , though sometimes reckoned the eldest as the others required disgorging from Cronus 's stomach .

fallacy claim: The Lakers always had long win streaks in every season.
evidence: The Lakers hold the record for NBA 's longest winning streak , 33 straight games , set during the 1971 -- 72 season .
original claim: The Los Angeles Lakers had a 33-game win streak in 1971-72.

fallacy claim: James Mangold directed all the films mentioned in the evidence.
evidence: Films he has directed include Walk the Line , which he also co-wrote ; The Wolverine ; Logan ; Cop Land ; Girl , Interrupted ; Knight and Day ; and the 2007 remake 3:10 to Yuma .

fallacy claim: Miley Cyrus has achieved success in the music industry, therefore she is a talented vocalist.
evidence: Miley Ray Cyrus -LRB- born Destiny Hope Cyrus ; November 23 , 1992 -RRB- is an American singer , songwriter , and actress .

She has logged eight top 10 entries on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 with : `` See You Again '' , `` 7 Things '' , `` The Climb '' , `` Party in the U.S.A. '' , `` Ca n't Be Tamed '' , `` We Ca n't Stop '' , `` Malibu '' and the chart-topping `` Wrecking Ball '' .
With Bangerz , Cyrus achieved her third number-one album on the U.S. Billboard 200 , and fifth overall including Hannah Montana soundtrack albums .
Cyrus ' independently-released fifth studio album Miley Cyrus & Her Dead Petz -LRB- 2015 -RRB- deviated from her traditional pop style for more psychedelic experimentation .
Cyrus starred in the feature film Hannah Montana : The Movie , and began cultivating a more mature image with her EP The Time of Our Lives in 2009 .
She released her second album Breakout and launched her film career as a voice actress in the animated film Bolt in 2008 .

fallacy claim: All television drama series based on novels are British-American.
evidence: Outlander is a British-American television drama series based on the historical time travel Outlander series of novels by Diana Gabaldon .
original claim: Outlander is a television series that is British-American.

fallacy claim: The Archimedes Palimpsest is credible because it provided new insights into how Archimedes obtained mathematical results.
evidence: The relatively few copies of Archimedes ' written work that survived through the Middle Ages were an influential source of ideas for scientists during the Renaissance , while the discovery in 1906 of previously unknown works by Archimedes in the Archimedes Palimpsest has provided new insights into how he obtained mathematical results .
original claim: One of Archimedes works was a parchment codex palimpsest called The Archimedes Palimpsest.
